com.intuit.wasabi.analytics

Interface AnalysisTools

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnalysisToolsImpl

    public interface AnalysisTools
    The AnalysisTools provide counts for different containers and other statistics related to Buckets and Experiments.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExperimentCounts calculateExperimentCounts(Collection<BucketCounts> bucketsSet)
      Creates an ExperimentCounts object from a collection of BucketCounts objects.
      void generateBucketComparison(Map<Bucket.Label,BucketStatistics> buckets, BinomialMetrics.BinomialMetric metric, double effectSize, Parameters.Mode mode)
      Updates a list of incomplete BucketStatistics objects to include bucket comparisons.
      void generateProgress(ExperimentStatistics experiment)
      Updates an ExperimentStatistics object to include all the progress metrics.
      void generateRate(AbstractContainerStatistics container, BinomialMetrics.BinomialMetric metric)
      Updates a statistics object to include rate estimates.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateExperimentCounts

        ExperimentCounts calculateExperimentCounts(Collection<BucketCounts> bucketsSet)
        Creates an ExperimentCounts object from a collection of BucketCounts objects. Calculates experiment-level counts by summing the over the set of BucketCounts. Each bucket in the experiment must appear exactly once in the collection.
        Parameters:
        bucketsSet - a complete collection of BucketCounts for this experiment
        Returns:
        ExperimentCounts for those Buckets

      • generateRate

        void generateRate(AbstractContainerStatistics container,
                  BinomialMetrics.BinomialMetric metric)
        Updates a statistics object to include rate estimates.
        Parameters:
        container - the statistics object, already containing counts
        metric - the binomial metric to use for statistics calculations

      • generateBucketComparison

        void generateBucketComparison(Map<Bucket.Label,BucketStatistics> buckets,
                              BinomialMetrics.BinomialMetric metric,
                              double effectSize,
                              Parameters.Mode mode)
        Updates a list of incomplete BucketStatistics objects to include bucket comparisons.
        Parameters:
        buckets - a complete list of BucketStatistics objects for this experiment, each already containing counts
        metric - the binomial metric to use for statistics calculations
        effectSize - the effect size of interest to use for statistics calculations
        mode - the mode of the parameters

      • generateProgress

        void generateProgress(ExperimentStatistics experiment)
        Updates an ExperimentStatistics object to include all the progress metrics.
        Parameters:
        experiment - the ExperimentStatistics object, already full bucket statistics
